hanzi-su-wiki:
脊

Значения

Спина

Мнемоника

Спинной хребет 人 и ребра. Внизу — мясо 月, его много на спине.

heisig_keyword: spinal column | stature телосложение, позвоночник, высота, постать
heisig_chinese_memo: Look", says the teacher in biology class. "The backbone holds your flesh together, just like the metal rod of this umbrella (he demonstrates this with an umbrella covered in I-Ching symbols) holds the umbrella together".
heisig_constituent: spinal column, I Ching, Master Po, umbrella, moon, month, flesh, part of the body
heisig_story: The spinal column has sprouted out of the flesh of your back into an umbrella that you always have with you, rain or shine. The pair of 2s on each side are the "ribs" of the umbrella. Take care to keep your image of the key word distinct from that for spine (Frame 24).
myStory: не даёт телу выпасть из грудной клетки
koohiiStory1: Look, says the teacher in biology class. "The spinal column holds your flesh together, just like the metal rod of this umbrella (he demonstrates this with an umbrella covered in I-Ching symbols) holds the umbrella together".
koohiiStory2: A pictograph of a spinal column. The umbrella representing the shoulder blades, the I Ching as the shoulder muscles and the part of the body as the spine itself.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you put two two pound weights on a person on the moon they'll increase in stature when they come back down. Everything is lighter on the moon so the person won't even feel the weights. Then when they come back to earth they'll have grown a whole two inches taller!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine how much height you'd gain if you spent time lifting weights on the moon!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Getting a taller stature will also make you seem super sexy (せき) on the moon and back home on earth. If you stay on the moon long enough, you'll be the tallest person in the galaxy and who wouldn't find that sexy?! Huh?
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine how sexy the height of a ten foot tall person would be after just coming back from weight training on the moon.
Ru_Radicals: 二 (два), 个 (китайский счётный суффикс), 月 (месяц), 癶 (крыша с точками)

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Look", says the teacher in biology class. "The backbone holds your flesh together, just like the metal rod of this umbrella (he demonstrates this with an umbrella covered in I-Ching symbols) holds the umbrella together".
humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze inscription resembles the shape of a fish ridge, used as a person's name (Li Xueqin, Liu Zhao, Zhang Yachu, etc.) The characters of the Qin family in the Warring States period start from " rou " and " piao ". The form of Xiaozhuan changed from " 𠦬 ". (Liu Zhao, Huang Dekuan) It is said that " ridge " is a word that understands the shape of the spine and " flesh ". (Zhang Yachu, Yang Zesheng)

The original meaning of " ridge " is the spine, the flesh and blood in the middle of the backs of humans and vertebrates. "Said the text": "The ridge, the back also. From the meat." Such as "Mozi. "Ming Ghost 2": "In Japan, Du Bo rides a white horse carriage, Zhu Yiguan, holds a Zhu bow, carries Zhu Shi, chases Zhou Xuanwang, shoots into the vehicle, folds the ridge in the center, dies in the car, and died." "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Bamboo Slips. Legal Questions and Answers" Jan. 75: "Can you break the spine and neck bones? It means that the neck spine is broken by a beating. How should it be treated? Same treatment as breaking limbs.

The " ridge " also refers to the raised part in the middle of an object. Such as "Zhuangzi. "Said the Sword": "The sword of the princes uses the knowledgeable warrior as the front, the incorruptible as the anchor, the virtuous as the spine, the loyal and sage as the crotch, and the magnate as the claw." Meng Jiao of the Tang Dynasty: "The book collection leaned on the ridge of the roof, not hesitating to be deaf with everyone."

" Spine " also means order. "poetry. Xiaoya. "New Years Day": "Wei Hao Si said that there is a spine, and there is a spine." Mao Chuan: "Lun, Dao; spine, rationale."
humanum_short_description_en: Inscription on the shape of a fish ridge. The characters of the Qin family in the Warring States period began with the pictophonetic characters of " flesh " and "朿". The form of Xiaozhuan changed from " 𠦬 ". The original meaning is the backbone, the flesh and blood in the middle of the backs of humans and vertebrates.
humanum_full_description:
金文象魚脊之形，用為人名。（李學勤、劉釗、張亞初等）戰國秦系文字從「肉」，「朿」聲的形聲字。小篆字形訛變為從「𠦬」。（劉釗、黃德寬）一說「脊」乃從脊骨形、從「肉」的會意字。（張亞初、楊澤生）

　　「脊」的本義是脊骨，即人和脊椎動物背部中間的骨肉。《說文》：「脊，背呂也。从𠦬从肉。」如《墨子．明鬼下》：「日中，杜伯乘白馬素車，朱衣冠，執朱弓，挾朱矢，追周宣王，射入車上，中心折脊，殪車中，伏弢而死。」《睡虎地秦簡．法律答問》簡75：「鬬折脊項骨，可（何）論？比折支（肢）」意謂鬬毆折斷了頸脊骨，應如何論處？與折斷四肢同樣論處。

　　「脊」也泛指物體中間高起的部分。如《莊子．說劍》：「諸侯之劍，以知勇士為鋒，以清廉士為鍔，以賢良士為脊，以忠聖士為鐔，以豪桀士為鋏。」唐代孟郊〈勸善吟〉：「藏書拄屋脊，不惜與凡聾。」

　　「脊」還表示條理。《詩．小雅．正月》：「維號斯言，有倫有脊。」毛傳：「倫，道；脊，理也。」
humanum_short_description: 金文象魚脊之形。戰國秦系文字從「肉」，「朿」聲的形聲字。小篆字形訛變為從「𠦬」。本義是脊骨，即人和脊椎動物背部中間的骨肉。

金文象魚脊之形，用為人名。（李學勤、劉釗、張亞初等）戰國秦系文字從「 肉 」，「 朿 」聲的形聲字。小篆字形訛變為從「 𠦬 」。（劉釗、黃德寬）一說「 脊 」乃從脊骨形、從「 肉 」的會意字。（張亞初、楊澤生） 「 脊 」的本義是脊骨，即人和脊椎動物背部中間的骨肉。《說文》：「脊，背呂也。从𠦬从肉。」如《墨子．明鬼下》：「日中，杜伯乘白馬素車，朱衣冠，執朱弓，挾朱矢，追周宣王，射入車上，中心折脊，殪車中，伏弢而死。」《睡虎地秦簡．法律答問》簡75：「鬬折脊項骨，可（何）論？比折支（肢）」意謂鬬毆折斷了頸脊骨，應如何論處？與折斷四肢同樣論處。 「 脊 」也泛指物體中間高起的部分。如《莊子．說劍》：「諸侯之劍，以知勇士為鋒，以清廉士為鍔，以賢良士為脊，以忠聖士為鐔，以豪桀士為鋏。」唐代孟郊〈勸善吟〉：「藏書拄屋脊，不惜與凡聾。」 「 脊 」還表示條理。《詩．小雅．正月》：「維號斯言，有倫有脊。」毛傳：「倫，道；脊，理也。」

脊字的基本解释

脊
jǐ
人和动物背上中间的骨头：脊椎。脊髓。脊柱。脊梁。脊背。脊椎动物。
中间高起的部分：山脊。屋脊。书脊。

脊字的起名意思

指人或动物背部的中轴骨骼或者物体中间高起像脊的部分。

ridge
Basic explanation of words
ridge
jǐ
The middle bones on the backs of humans and animals: the spine. spinal cord. spine. Spine. back. vertebrate.
The raised part in the middle: the ridge. Roof ridge. Spine.
ridge
Chinese dictionary definition of words
ridge
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
ridge
Source glyph
ridge
Name meaning
Refers to the axial bone on the back of a person or animal or the part that rises like a ridge in the middle of an object.
jǐ
1) позвоночник, позвоночный столб
脊肋 позвоночник и рёбра
2) конёк (крыши); хребет (горный); гребень
山脊 горный хребет
书脊 корешок книги
屋脊 конёк крыши дома
剑脊 грань (ребро жёсткости на обоюдоостром лезвии меча)
高压脊 гребень высокого давления
Radicals: 二, 人, 月  (two, person, moon)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you put two two pound weights on a person on the moon they'll increase in stature when they come back down. Everything is lighter on the moon so the person won't even feel the weights. Then when they come back to earth they'll have grown a whole two inches taller!
Imagine how much height you'd gain if you spent time lifting weights on the moon!
Reading Mnemonic
Getting a taller stature will also make you seem super sexy (せき) on the moon and back home on earth. If you stay on the moon long enough, you'll be the tallest person in the galaxy and who wouldn't find that sexy?! Huh?
Imagine how sexy the height of a ten foot tall person would be after just coming back from weight training on the moon.
